name: Privacy protection via partial processing
description: Limiting the scope of file processing based on type, date or other criteria to protect privacy.
details: The files may still be present in the data set or removed, or made in accessible but the core of the technique to to provide a limited set of artifacts, compared with full processing.
references: Dickinson (2020) ‘Privacy by design – 10 ways MSAB can help you meet the challenges.’ MSAB Blog. Available at: https://www.msab.com/blog/privacy-by-design-10-ways-msab-can-help-you-meet-the-challenges/
